adDetails: I want to share with you my passion for good food. I have 10 yrs experience as a Chef in high end restaurants in South Bay. I am mostly influenced by the French and Spanish cuisines but have a much wider background . I like to choose the best from the different cuisines to create new dishes. My Goal: To provide you with an excellent dining experience every day at home. My Duty: 1. Create a great menu every day, based on what type of cuisine you prefer, choice of ingredients, special diet etc. 2. Select and purchase daily fresh ingredients 3. Cook and leave it ready for you . I am looking forward to sharing with you my creativity, experience and my appreciation for good food. Please contact me at show contact info Thanks Bruno.
